title: wine_Joseph_Phelps_2011_Pastorale_Vineyard_Pinot_Noir_(Sonoma_Coast)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 78226.
country: US.
description: The vineyard is located in the western part of Sonoma County, near the little town of Freestone. The cool 2011 vintage lends mouthwatering acidity to the wine, brightening flavors of red apples, pomegranates and persimmons. Right now, it's juvenile and tight, with primary fruits that are unintegrated with oak. Give it at least eight years in the cellar, and it could be going strong at the age of fifteen..
designation: Pastorale Vineyard.
